author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
One thing that recently came up is that we (geth) had a rule that forbids subcontainers to be referenced by two eofcreates. 
We removed that rule, but it seems that (at least in the current testing release) there is no test that actually confirms that a subcontainer can be referenced by two eofcreates.
Did someone add this between the latest release or should I add this?

author: chfast
content: You can add this or at least drop a line to https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/blob/main/tests/prague/eip7692_eof_v1/tracker.md

author: chfast
content: Do you still have the wrong code around?
